Package index

All functions

adj_intens()
Adjust spectral intensities to standard absorbance units.
restrict_range() flatten_range()
Range restriction and flattening for spectra
adj_wave()
Adjust wavelength to wavenumbers for Raman
as_OpenSpecy() is_OpenSpecy() check_OpenSpecy() OpenSpecy() gen_grid()
Create OpenSpecy objects
conform_spec()
Conform spectra to a standard wavenumber series
adj_res() conform_res() adj_neg() mean_replace() is_empty_vector()
Normalization and conversion of spectral data
collapse_spec() def_features()
Define features
head(<OpenSpecy>) print(<OpenSpecy>) plot(<OpenSpecy>) summary(<OpenSpecy>) as.data.frame(<OpenSpecy>) as.data.table(<OpenSpecy>)
Generic Open Specy Methods
human_ts()
Create human readable timestamps
plotly_spec() heatmap_spec() interactive_plot()
Interactive plots for OpenSpecy objects
write_spec() read_spec() as_hyperSpec()
Read and write spectral data
make_rel()
Make spectral intensities relative
check_lib() get_lib() load_lib() rm_lib()
Manage spectral libraries
manage_na()
Ignore or remove NA intensities
c_spec() sample_spec() merge_map()
Manage spectral objects
cor_spec() match_spec() ident_spec() get_metadata() max_cor_named() filter_spec() ai_classify() fill_spec() os_similarity()
Identify and filter spectra
process_spec()
Process Spectra
raman_hdpe
Sample Raman spectrum
read_envi()
Read ENVI data
read_text() read_asp() read_spa() read_spc() read_jdx() read_extdata()
Read spectral data
read_any() read_many() read_zip()
Read spectral data from multiple files
read_opus()
Read spectral data from Bruker OPUS binary files
read_opus_raw()
Read a Bruker OPUS spectrum binary raw string
run_app()
Run Open Specy app
sig_noise()
Calculate signal and noise metrics for OpenSpecy objects
smooth_intens() calc_window_points()
Smooth spectral intensities
spatial_smooth()
Spatial Smoothing of OpenSpecy Objects
spec_res()
Spectral resolution
split_spec()
Split Open Specy objects
subtr_baseline()
Automated background subtraction for spectral data
test_lib
Test reference library
